about_the_game:
This DLC package is a present for all early access adopters of Killer Gin.

Once the game is fully released, this package will either completely disappear or become paid content.

The unique items found in this package will be found in a special treasure chest in Homestead (The dating/farming mini-game within the main RPG).

Items Included:
- Passion Token - Allows you to change 1 characters sexual preference to any you prefer (Can only be used once per game, only on discovered characters).
- Infinity Remembrance Token - Teleports you back to the last level you entered in the Infinite Dungeon (recharges every 3 days).
- Full Moon Token - Forces a full Moon during the night (Recharges every 3 days).
- Storm Token - Forces a storm for 24 hrs (Recharges every 4 days).
- Sunny Token - Forces a sunny day for 24 hrs (Recharges every 4 days).

- More will be added!

This DLC package is a present for all early access adopters of Killer Gin.

Once the game is fully released, this package will either completely disappear or become paid content.

The unique items found in this package will be found in a special treasure chest in Homestead (The dating/farming mini-game within the main RPG).

Items Included:
- Passion Token - Allows you to change 1 characters sexual preference to any you prefer (Can only be used once per game, only on discovered characters).
- Infinity Remembrance Token - Teleports you back to the last level you entered in the Infinite Dungeon (recharges every 3 days).
- Full Moon Token - Forces a full Moon during the night (Recharges every 3 days).
- Storm Token - Forces a storm for 24 hrs (Recharges every 4 days).
- Sunny Token - Forces a sunny day for 24 hrs (Recharges every 4 days).

legal_notice: Killer Gin is a registered Trademark

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 or Up to Mac OS X 10.14.6
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

name: Killer Gin Early Access DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

short_description: This DLC package is a present for all early access adopters of Killer Gin. Adds 5+ unique items to the game, many items are intended for Homestead mode, the dating/farming mini-game within Killer Gin.
